Name: Helix
About the game: HELIX is a single player platform action game. Use your special skill of changing gravity and go on a platform adventure of a lifetime. Go fast as you can by upgrading your character and try not to die by dangerous spikes. Change your gravity Change your gravity to beat the level by the ways you would have not imagined. Upgrade your character You can upgrade your character with the coins that you collected and make your character gain more hearts or speeds to help you out on your great platform adventure. Assist Mode Is game too hard for you? Do not worry! WE have Assist Mode to help you out, if you use Assist Mode , the game over will be disabled so you can enjoy the game without any stress! Die If you lose all of your hearts during game you'll be sent back to level one and you'll lose all of your coins, so be careful what you do!
